actions.committee: Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read second time and referred to Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control on Lake Witchita, Holliday Creek, Texas.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control on Lake Wichita, Holliday Creek, Texas.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the project for flood control on Lake Witchita, Holliday Creek, Texas.
